name: One turn Takoyaki
description:
★ ENTRY FOR GAME MAKER TOOLKIT GAME JAM 2019★

Try to annihilate enemies in ONE turn!... Otherwise they will kill you.

STORY

Ptolemy angered the violet witch and thus got banished from the elder forest.
He pleaded for her forgiveness but the witch did not plan to let him off easily.
She tasked him to slay the seven Primordials and bring their heads to her

CONCEPT

- You will face the Primordials in turn based combat
- You will have only one turn to kill the beasts before they annihilate you.
Magic in this world is elusive. The words for the incantations are arcane, extensive and difficult to remember.
- You can only memorize five spells for every battle and those spells will be forgotten forever once used.

TEAM

  • Lead Programmer - Red Salmon
  • Assistant Programmer - Kraily4t8
  • Art - Gabiszon
  • Music - Lacha

Thanks for playing!
